ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Propose a synthesis of p-(dimethylamino)azobenzene with benzene as your only organic starting material.
detailedSolution: 1. HNO3, H2SO4; 2. SnCl2; 3a. 2 equiv. CH3I; 3b. NaNO2, H2SO4; 4. product of 3a + product of 3b
